alert.note: Alert for Ceiba; Naguabo (Puerto Rico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Juan (San Juan, Puerto Rico)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued October 02 at 2:01AM ADT by NWS San Juan
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 AM AST EARLY THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Urban and small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of Puerto Rico, including the following counties, Ceiba and Naguabo. * WHEN...Until 400 AM AST. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. River or stream flows are elevated,especially Rio Blanco and its tributaries. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 101 AM AST, Doppler radar indicated periods of moderate to heavy rains with passing showers and possible thunderstorms. This will cause urban and small stream flooding. So far an half inch up to 1 inch of rain has fallen. - Additional rainfall amounts up to 1 inch are expected over the area. This additional rain will result in minor urban flooding and continued rise along the Rio Blanco river and surrounding tributaries. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Naguabo, Ceiba, Aguas Claras, Roosevelt Roads, Duque, Daguao, Rio Blanco and Pena Pobre. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding. Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads.
